勘: (kan) - intuição, percepção, intuição, o sexto sentido
勘える: (かんがえる) - to think about/to take into consideration; to ponder/to reflect/to try to come at a conclusion/to think over (something); to intend/to decide (to do)/to plan; to come up with/to devise/to scheme; to predict/to anticipate/to expect; to suspect/to doubt; to consider (somebody to be something)/to look on
勘ぐる: (かんぐる) - to be suspicious of (someone's motives); to suspect someone of having ulterior motives
勘づく: (かんづく) - to suspect; to get an inkling (of something); to smell (danger); to apprehend
勘の良い人: (かんのいいひと) - person of quick perception
勘を働かせる: (かんをはたらかせる) - to use one's intuition; to use one's instinct; to use one's head
勘亭流: (かんていりゅう) - Kantei style of calligraphy
勘付く: (かんづく) - to suspect; to get an inkling (of something); to smell (danger); to apprehend
勘八: (カンパチ) - greater amberjack (Seriola dumerili); purplish amberjack; greater yellowtail
勘合貿易: (かんごうぼうえき) - licensed trade between Japan and Ming-dynasty China during the Muromachi period
勘定: (kanjou) - cálculo, computação, contagem, cálculo, contar; conta, verificação, faturamento, pagamento (de uma conta), liquidação (de uma conta); cálculo, computação, contagem, cálculo, contar; conta, verificação, faturamento, pagamento (de uma conta), liquidação (de uma conta); consideração, concessão
勘定ずく: (かんじょうずく) - calculating, profit-or-loss mentality
勘定を払う: (かんじょうをはらう) - to settle one's account; to pay a bill
勘定を済ます: (かんじょうをすます) - to pay one's bill
勘定係: (かんじょうがかり) - cashier; accountant; treasurer
勘定奉行: (かんじょうぶぎょう) - chief financial official (Edo period)/commissioner of finance/chief treasurer/paymaster; chief accountant in a daimyo's service (Muromachi period)
勘定尻: (かんじょうじり) - balance of an account
勘定尽く: (かんじょうづく) - calculating, profit-or-loss mentality
勘定書き: (かんじょうがき) - bill; one's account
勘定科目: (かんじょうかもく) - {bus} account name; account title
勘定高い: (かんじょうだかい) - calculating; mercenary; closefisted

勘所: (かんどころ) - finger board (of a musical instrument); vital point
勘案: (かんあん) - taking into consideration; giving consideration (to); thinking
勘繰る: (かんぐる) - to be suspicious of (someone's motives); to suspect someone of having ulterior motives
勘能: (かんのう) - (堪能 only)  proficient/skillful; (orig. meaning) patience/perseverance/fortitude
勘責: (かんせき) - reproving for a fault
勘進: (かんしん) - reporting after careful investigation
務まる: (つとまる) - to be fit for; to be equal to; to function properly
務める: (つとめる) - (usu. 勤める) to work (for)/to be employed (at)/to serve (in); (usu. 務める) to serve (as)/to act (as)/to fill (the position of)/to play the role (of); (usu. 勤める) to conduct a religious service
務所送り: (むしょおくり) - being sent to prison
勝: (shou/ka/masa) - win , win, victory; beautiful scenery, scenic spot; counter for wins
勝ちっ放し: (かちっぱなし) - winning straight victories; making a clean score
勝ちっ放す: (かちっぱなす) - to win consecutive; to have a long winning streak
勝ちとる: (かちとる) - to exert oneself and win; to gain (victory)
勝ちどき: (かちどき) - shout of victory; cry of triumph
勝ち上がる: (かちあがる) - to win through (e.g. to finals); to advance
勝ち取る: (かちとる) - to exert oneself and win; to gain (victory)
勝ち名乗り: (かちなのり) - {sumo} being declared the winner of a bout
勝ち得: (かちどく) - {sumo} win of a low-ranked wrestler in the extra eighth bout in the tournament
勝ち得る: (かちえる) - to achieve; to win; to gain; to attain
勝ち投手: (かちとうしゅ) - (ant: 負け投手) winning pitcher
勝ち抜き戦: (かちぬきせん) - tournament; knockout competition
勝ち残り: (かちのこり) - {sumo} winning wrestler who remains ringside in case his involvement is needed in pre-bout rituals
勝ち残る: (かちのこる) - to win and advance to the next round
勝ち気: (かちき) - determined spirit; unyielding spirit; will
勝ち目はない: (かちめはない) - to have no chance (of succeeding)
勝ち目は無い: (かちめはない) - to have no chance (of succeeding)
勝ち組: (かちぐみ) - (ant: 負け組) winners (those who have succeeded socially, economically, etc.)
勝ち組み: (かちぐみ) - (ant: 負け組) winners (those who have succeeded socially, economically, etc.)
勝ち誇る: (かちほこる) - to triumph; to be elated with success
勝ち越し: (かちこし) - more wins than losses (sport)
勝ち越す: (かちこす) - to have more wins than losses; to lead (someone) by (three) matches
勝ち逃げ: (かちにげ) - quitting while one is ahead
勝ち通す: (かちとおす) - to win straight victories
勝ち進む: (かちすすむ) - to win and advance to the next round
勝ち鬨: (かちどき) - shout of victory; cry of triumph
勝って兜の緒を締めよ: (かってかぶとのおをしめよ) - (proverb) don't let your guard down even after a victory
勝つ: (かつ) - to win; to gain victory

勝どき: (かちどき) - shout of victory; cry of triumph
勝る: (まさる) - to excel/to surpass/to exceed/to have an edge/to be superior/to outrival; to outweigh/to preponderate
勝るとも劣らない: (まさるともおとらない) - not at all inferior to; rival or surpass; compare favorably (with)
